snippet.title: Zlime: Return Of Demon Lord - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Hello, we are the DuoAB team which currently developing the game "Zlime Return Of Demon Lord" that combines the Casual and Roguelite action genres. The  early access version is expected to be available for purchase around the beginning of 2024. You can add to wishlist at 
Steam : https://shorturl.at/avR39
Facebook Fanpage : https://shorturl.at/nqyG7
